question: Which financial institution has approved USD 400 million loan to support the Namami Gange programme of India?
explanation:
The World Bank and the Government of India has recently signed a loan agreement to provide support for the Namami Gange programme.
The programme aims to rejuvenate the Ganga river. The USD 400 million fund comprises a loan of USD 381 million and a guarantee of up to USD 19 million. The Second National Ganga River Basin Project aims to reduce population and support river basin management.
